pullrequest.title: [Acropolis] Add Link: a convenience class for interfacing with link entities

content.raw:
[Here](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2842/deprecate-gazebo-common-color/diff)'s an example. In summary:

* Add `IGN_DEPRECATED` macro
* Add `\deprecated` to doxygen
* Add entries on `Migration.md`
* Change all code to use new API
* Add `#pragma GCC diagnostic ignored "-Wdeprecated-declarations"` to places which can't be changed to new API

Let me know if you have any questions. Also feel free to leave this for a future PR.
content.html:
Here's an example. In summary:

  • Add IGN_DEPRECATED macro
  • Add \deprecated to doxygen
  • Add entries on Migration.md
  • Change all code to use new API
  • Add #pragma GCC diagnostic ignored "-Wdeprecated-declarations" to places which can't be changed to new API

Let me know if you have any questions. Also feel free to leave this for a future PR.

pullrequest.title: [Acropolis] Add Link: a convenience class for interfacing with link entities

content.raw: As we spoke in person, it will be a bit tricky to deprecate this one because we can't overload functions just changing the return type. We can leave `Model` for another PR.
content.html: As we spoke in person, it will be a bit tricky to deprecate this one because we can't overload functions just changing the return type. We can leave Model for another PR.

pullrequest.title: [Acropolis] Add Link: a convenience class for interfacing with link entities

content.raw: Are you sure this is expressed in the world frame? The `ign-math` documentation says it's about the CoM frame (i.e. inertial pose), and that's how the component is constructed from SDF as well.
content.html: Are you sure this is expressed in the world frame? The ign-math documentation says it's about the CoM frame (i.e. inertial pose), and that's how the component is constructed from SDF as well.

pullrequest.title: [Acropolis] Add Link: a convenience class for interfacing with link entities

content.html: Good catch!! Changed in 93230d4 to calculate the MOI in the world frame.

content.raw:
Homebrew: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1072/testReport/junit/(root)/LinkIntegrationTest/LinkInertiaMatrix/

```
/Users/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/ign-gazebo/test/integration/link.cc:252
Value of: *link.WorldInertiaMatrix(ecm)
  Actual: 0.4 -0.02 -0.02 -0.02 0.4 0.02 -0.02 0.02 0.4
Expected: expMoi
Which is: 0.38 0 0 -0 0.438284 0.01 0 0.01 0.381716
```
content.html:
Homebrew: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1072/testReport/junit/(root)/LinkIntegrationTest/LinkInertiaMatrix/

/Users/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/ign-gazebo/test/integration/link.cc:252

Expected: expMoi
Which is: 0.38 0 0 -0 0.438284 0.01 0 0.01 0.381716
